bug.author: noshaba
bug.description: Maybe not a bug per se but why does the "latest_release" tag redirect you to tag 0.13.0 rather than to 0.15.1?

comments.comment: Thank you for signaling this to us. (I think it does qualify as a bug) We have made 0.15.1 the latest_release and we will be investigating why the latest_release was set to 0.13.0. For reference : MLA-956
